title: Amazingly Affordable 3 BR Apartment Home At Lakecrest Village!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Lakecrest Village Apartments offers two, three, and four bedroom apartments at a reasonable price!', 'In-home amenities include fully equipped kitchens, washer and dryer connections, spacious floor plans, large closets, individual hot water heaters, ceiling fans, private patios, central air conditioning, cable ready and much more!', 'Located in Houston, TX, Lakecrest Village Apartments offers a small town location and is just a short drive to the downtown Houston area.', 'Residents of Lakecrest Village truly get the best of both worlds.', 'Voucher Holders Welcome!', 'Please Join the Interest List for more information.', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Gated Controlled Access Community Entrance System', '- Private Patio Area', '- Open & Spacious Floor Plans', '- Individually Controlled Hot Water System', '- On-Site Bus Shelter', '- High-Speed Internet & Cable Ready', 'We are a pet-friendly community.', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Lakecrest Village participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3', 'Occupants: $48,660 | 4', 'Occupants: $54,060 | 5 Occupants: $58,440 | 6', 'Occupants: $62,760 | 7 Occupants: $67,080 | 8', 'Occupants: $71,400.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Tuesday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Thursday-Friday:10:00AM-5:00PM', '*Management Office is open Wednesday by appointment only.', 'Call today to schedule your tour:', 'show contact info', 'Lakecrest Village', '9393 Tidwell Road', 'Houston, TX, 77078', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'ga3prNDJ8Rmy']
